preproc.csvconverter
Class ASCIToVOTableConverter

java.lang.Object
  preproc.csvconverter.ASCIToVOTableConverter
Direct Known Subclasses:
FixedRowWidthConverter, VizierTableConverter
public abstract class ASCIToVOTableConverter
extends java.lang.Object

Convert an ASCII file with columns with fixed width into as VOTable ASCII file format is handled by subclasses Any format error throws a FatalExcption USAGE: subclassname if=inputfilename [of=outputfilename] The output file if outputfilename if the second parameter is set The output is set to stdout if outputfilename = - The output is set to inputfilename.xml if outputfilename is not set.

Author:
michel
